description: Erection of rear dormer roof extension with installation of 2no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

The facing materials for the development herby approved must be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

Condition 5 of planning permission ref: 22/02018/CREG3 is as follows:'Prior to occupation a Secured by Design final certificate shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: In order to achieve the principles and objectives of Secured by Design to improve community safety and crime prevention in accordance with Policy CS 14 of Kingston Core Strategy: Safer Communities, Policy DM 22 Design for Safety and Policy D3 of the London Plan (2021).'The applicant has submitted a 'Gold Award Certificate dated 20 July 2023'. The submitted Certificate is considered to be sufficient for the purposes of discharge Condition 5 of planning permission ref: 22/02018/CREG3. It is recommended that the details are approved.

For the avoidance of doubt, please confirm the description 'Conversion of an existing garage into a habitable space, erection of two storey side, single storey rear and first floor rear/side extension. Roof extension with rear and front dormer, installation of 1 no side rooflight.'
